author: Joshua Gransbury
title: Technology Evaluation Centers (TEC) Adds Seasoned Experts to Expand Its RFP Alert Services Division
text:
Technology Evaluation Centers (TEC) is pleased to announce that the Info-Opportunités team has joined TEC’s RFP Alert Services division. The move brings seasoned experts of the Canadian public tenders market to TEC’s RFP Alert Services, resulting in a stronger service offering to new and existing clients. RFP Alert Services provides businesses with timely education and expert guidance on the specific features of every type of government procurement (federal, state/provincial, and municipal). The company also researches and reports on business opportunities for contractors of every size and type serving the public sector, as well as on the procurement procedures of public and para-public-sector organizations in virtually every region of the globe.
The division consists of experienced consultants who focus exclusively on the specific needs of tenders-seeking businesses and contractors. Its service offering ranges from drawing up tenders to conducting strategic research, developing helpful products, customized training, and many other specialized services.
The core offering of the RFP Alert Services division is its simple-to-use yet powerful tender-searching tool that provides periodic alerts about available tenders matched to each subscriber’s search criteria such as industry / sector (e.g., technology/IT, infrastructure repair, construction, security and other specialized contracted services, etc.), geographic location, and more.
As managing director, Joshua Gransbury notes, “Beginning with our proprietary tenders-matching tool, and extending to a full-range of specialized services, RFP Alert Services offers its clients an unprecedented reach into the burgeoning field of public sector tenders. We are excited to have the team from Info-Opportunités join us to add to our deep knowledge base and greatly expand our geographic reach.”
The new RFP Alert Services website will go live soon. In the interim, for more information contact Joshua Gransbury, managing director of RFP Alert Services at tenderinquiry(at)technologyevaluation(dot)com.
About RFP Alert Services, a division of TEC
RFP Alert Services, a division of Technology Evaluation Centers (TEC) is Canada’s leading provider of public tenders tracking services and specialized consulting services for companies participating in government procurement opportunities. Its primary objective is to help companies successfully navigate the often complex process of bidding on public tenders of all types.
For more information in advance of the launch of the new website, please email tenderinquiry(at)technologyevaluation(dot)com.
About Technology Evaluation Centers (TEC)
Technology Evaluation Centers (TEC) is the world’s leading provider of software selection resources, services, and research materials, helping organizations evaluate and select the best enterprise software for their needs. With its advanced decision-making process and software selection experts, TEC reduces the time, cost, and risk associated with enterprise software selection.
Over 3.5 million subscribers leverage TEC’s extensive research and detailed information on more than 1,000 leading software solutions across all major application areas. TEC is recognized as an industry-leading software selection advisory firm offering resources and services both online and onsite. For more information, please visit http://www.technologyevaluation.com .
